clean_data: Sr AEM DeveloperAdministrator Sr AEM span lDeveloperspanAdministrator Sr AEM DeveloperAdministrator FCA Raleigh NC 8 years of experience in analysis design and implementation of web applications using Java and Adobe CQ Worked on developing and delivering endto end CMS infrastructure to many large organizations Have knowledge of the objectoriented programming objectoriented analysis and development using J2EE technologies Experience in developing Content Management System based using Adobe CQ 55 CQ 56 AEM60 and AEM 61 Hands on experience in developing Templates components using JSP OSGI bundles sling services custom workflow process and customizing out of the box widget and components Worked on Adobe CQAEM product suite including CQAEM CRX CQ WCM and DAM Excellent work experience in CRXDE CRXDE Lite OSGI Framework JCR Apache sling Template development Component Development and installation of author and Publish instances Design develop and support CMS components integrations and applications Experience implementing enhancing and troubleshooting AEMCQ 55 installations Implemented Adobe CQ templates components workflow style sheets and Meta tagging and performed CMS administration tasks Strong knowledge on employing Java Content Repository JCR for developing applications on Adobe CQ Experience in requirements gathering analysis design development unit testing integration code review implementation and support activities Experience of Front End Technologies like HTML 5 CSS 3 AJAX JSP JavaScript jQuery JSON Experience in using jQuery and JavaScript libraries Experience working in Agile Methodology development environment Strong experience with setting up AEMCQ5 using ApacheMaven and standard Eclipse tools Knowledge on the Adobe Experience Manager AEM administration activities such as User permissionscreations with LDAP synchronization Knowledge of web technologiesconfiguration IIS AEM dispatcher Apache configuration ie httpconf in UNIXLINUX platform Able to discuss relationships between HTML CSS and JavaScript Experience with the Linux operating system Experience with LDAP Install the Dispatcher module in LINUX platform on your web server and configure the web server accordingly Configure Dispatcher the dispatcher Any file Configure AEM so that content updates invalidate the cache Experience in developing applications using Java IDE tools like Eclipse and NetBeans Experienced in Databases like Oracle and SQL Server and writing SQL Queries Selfmotivated team player with and ability to learn new technologies and tools quickly AEM EXPERIENCE Hands on experience on Designing templates and overall site structure Custom Workflows Custom Widgets Personalization UI customization Content Finder Side kick Welcome page Component development Translation MSM concepts Replication Agents Dispatcher and server management JCR event handling Sling Scheduler DAM CRXDELite OSGI Adobe Search and Promote And other concepts Work Experience Sr AEM DeveloperAdministrator FCA Auburn Hills MI December 2018 to Present Responsibilities AEM application and Apache Web server installation on Linux servers with all the necessary requirements and delivering the environment on time AEM Application data refresh from one environment to another environment User and group management on AEM application Worked on AMS environment Involved in migration of AEM 63 to 64 Creation Building InstallingDeploying new packages on AEM Configured Dispatcher 20 according to Adobe recommendation As part of Dispatcher 20 improved the security and reduced vulnerabilities environments and automated deployment through release management tools Involved in Performance and load testing and Implementing Adobe recommendations wherever required to configuration files Various system performance optimization stability and scalability efforts in Adobe Platform Response time initial analysis of Heap dump and Thread dump to prevent abrupt environment slowness Proactively Monitoring of both Author Publish Environments as well as activationreplication queues Developed custom components for all the FCA Brand websites Configured replication agents and disabled some of the OOTB agents as per the customers request and configured sling mapping and created flush users Supported Apache Solr servers for implemented on Azure cloud Root cause analysis of recurring defects and incidents Resolving environmental and Configuration issues related to application Adobe AEM63Hot Fix  management Handling errors in a customized way for errors related to server and their individual error messages like 403 404 and 500 errors Adobe Experience Manager CQ5 application installation and configuration in WINDOWUNIXLINUX platform and dispatcher configuring on apache and apache configurations deploying modules configuration updates including monitoring of website servers front end and back end performance and functionality Knowledge on the Adobe Experience Manager CQ5 administration activities such as Automatic deployment User permissionscreations with LDAP synchronization Did content sync using Grabbit tool and Vault rcp tools from Prod to UAT and TEST environments Performed ACLs migration using ACS commons from AEM 63 to 64 Knowledge of web technologiesconfiguration IIS AEM dispatcher Apache configuration ie httpconf in UNIXLINUX platform Experience with Jira installation and connecting to LDAP users and creating project groups Install the Dispatcher module In LINUX platform on our web server and configure the web server accordingly Configure Dispatcher the dispatcher Any file Configure AEM so that content updates invalidate the cache Support of AEMCQ5 infrastructure with loadbalanced and failover capabilities Experience implementing enhancing and troubleshooting Adobe CQ5 installations Excellent interpersonal abilities communication skills time management and Team skills with an intention to work hard to meet project deadlines Environment Adobe CQ 636 4 Java jdk15 J2EE AWS JSP Servlets Java Script HTML CSS Ajax jQuery Apache Sling CRXDE CRX WCM Jackrabbit JCR Connector SVN log4j Apache Maven Windows and Linux Apache Solr Sr AEM Developer Thomson Reuters Eagan MN December 2017 to November 2018 Description AEM developer for theOpen webProject currently working on requirements using AEM Content Management tool ThomsonReuters has 4 Ecomm sites and 20 marketing sites This is Agile based model of 2week sprints Contributed significantly in Design Development Delivery of the user stories Responsibilities Involved in Sprint Planning Development Component creation Testing Delivery of User stories in every 2 weeks sprint Developed CQ components Workflow and Integrating CQ with other applications Development components using slightly Worked on versioning CSS and JS files Worked on SEO urls setting the URLs according to the best practice Worked on setting the Apache rules for the SEO URLs to redirect according to the requirement Created a custom component to track order forms on Google Analytics Worked on canonical tags and checked whether tags are correctly assignedso that external sites using OpenGraph protocol recognize the canonical Created a promotional banner component including an image time and link Developed custom widgets wherever required Fixed an issue of creating multiple customers when the user login as guest user and navigate through the site its creating multiple calls as per the flow Participated in Code migration and resolving code conflicts while moving to different environments Developing PagesTemplatesComponents in EclipseCRXDE Lite Development of modules and OSGI bundles ExportImport of Content via package manager Worked on Multi Site Manager MSM in AEM enforcing a common base structure and common content across the website Worked on Author instance to help authoring complex components on pages Developed OSGI Services and Components Participated in meetings related to application architecture designing and development Performed Unit Testing on developed modules and involved in trouble shooting the components and Interacted with the testing team to track the defects Give backend production support when there is any deployment Tested the changes in Development QA Stage environments thoroughly before going to production Environment Java JDK17 JSP Servlets Java Script HTML CSS Ajax JQuery JSON XML AEM 62 CRXDE WCM Apache Sling Jackrabbit JCR Connector Windows Maven JiraAdobe Search PromoteHybris AEM Developer Capital Group Irvine CA March 2017 to December 2017 Description Senior AEM developer for the Learning Portal Project Currently working on requirements for Learning portal intranet of company to design and implement it using AEM Content Management tool Contributed significantly in Design Development Delivery of the user stories Objective of the project is to simplify the content that the users need and use on a daily basis Responsibilities Involved in Agile based model with 2week Sprint Planning Development Component creation Testing Delivery of User stories in every 2 weeks sprint Well versed with SCRUM Agile Methodology and have significant experience leading small to medium size teams Been responsible for Gathering Requirements from Business and providing Technical Solution using AEM Fully involved in end to end delivery of Business requirements Analyzing designing and layout of the components Developed Custom functionality in Search and Promote Hands on working with Granite UI Modified the standard Tagging functionality Worked on Lucene Indexing for developing Custom Index rules for minimizing the search queries response time and for improving the performance Implemented custom java classes and used Apache Maven for build Used Sightly and Use API for presentation Setup and configure Authoring and Publishing environments replication agents CQ5 dispatcher to cache the landing page html and serve as the static pages from Apache Built and deployed OSGI bundles Configured SMTP server settings Developed Dam folder structure and uploaded DAM assets frequently Developed custom workflows and workflow steps Registered customized applications created responsibilities customized menus attached menus to responsibilities and assigning to users Designed and developed the organization of client libraries and created template components using inheritance Experience with backup restore of CQ instance JIRABitbucket was used to handle the productionET tickets and bug reporting Issue tracking tools Used GIT and SVN versioning tools and Experience with Continuous Integration and Automated Test Execution and building tools such as Jenkins Maven Environment Java  JSP Servlets Java Script HTML CSS jQuery  Apache Sling Sightly CRXDE JIRA AEM Developer Verizon Wireless Hilliard OH July 2016 to February 2017 Description Senior AEM developer for the KMSAEM simplification project this project is to simplify the content that the users need and use on a daily basis This project will migrate content that is currently being maintain in documentum into CQ5The project will include new formatted templates to ease the writing of content and UI for the display of content to the end user Responsibilities Installing author Publishing instances Gathering business requirements and converting them to technical solutions Involved in preparing the Business and Functional documents Analyzing
